name: uptodo.ME
tag_list: uptodo, task, knowledge-360, social, media, project, management, reminder
overview:
UpToDo is a powerful yet easy to use Social Media Integrated tool that helps you in taking control of your professional as well as personal life. UpToDo is your gateway to more organised and productive lifestyle as it makes task management simple, pervasive and fun.

UpToDo is a State of The Art tool from Innovation Lab of Knowledge360 and is powered by HnyB, a robust Social Application Platform.

Knowledge360 is knowledge centric organisation focused on creating highly productive business and personal applications. Innovation Lab is a Knowledge360 innovation incubation initiative. (Know More: http://www.crunchbase.com/company/knowledge-360)

With UpToDo you can easily:

  • Improve Your Productivity UpToDo’s customizable scheduling, personalised alerts, hotlist delegation, sharable group activity planning, socially enabled activity monitoring and always accessible sortable online to do list will help you in not only remembering important tasks but will also empower you to complete them on-time.

  • Organize Your Tasks UpToDo’s intuitive Interface, ease in scheduling tasks, social features like sharing or delegation of activities and Intelligent features like automated alerts as well as tracking makes it a useful companion for efficient time management and an excellent personal organiser.

  • Collaborate in Your Activities UpToDo’s exhaustive social capabilities help you to easily work, share insights and get suggestions from other people including your colleagues, professional contacts, friends and family or even industry pears, helping you to get more things done in better and more efficient manner.

  • Control Your Life UpToDo’s highly innovative tools like One click Import/Export, task hierarchy, group activities planning and delegation gives you more flexibility, sound understanding.and better access to your resources, making it a breeze to capture all the things you want to do and helps you in getting them done.
